item.title: Before the class starts
item.author: shawn.graham@carleton.ca (Dr. Shawn Graham)
item.description: Do this the moment you see this: Get Hypothesis & Join Our Class Group right now! Claim your topic as ‘Discussion Leader’ by Saturday Join our Discord space right now! Set up a Github account if you don’t already have one. Get Hypothesis & Join Our Class Group reate an account at hypothes.is: Get the Chrome app or the Firefox bookmarklet: Make sure you’re logged in: Then join our HIST4916a reading group.
